normal.speaker: Luke
normal.line: My name is Luke! I'm glad I can help you!

normal.speaker: Luke
normal.line: Wow, am I really fighting alongside people like you? This is amazing!

normal.speaker: Luke
normal.line: I'm going to be a great soldier one day, just you watch! I won't let anyone down.

normal.speaker: Luke
normal.line: Back in my village, we only heard stories of heroes... now I'm on my own story!

normal.speaker: Luke
normal.line: Just give me an order! I'm ready for anything!

taunt.speaker: Luke
taunt.line: It's not too late to do a good thing!

taunt.speaker: Luke
taunt.line: I'll make you stop those evil acts!

taunt.speaker: Luke
taunt.line: A true soldier protects the innocent! That's why I have to stop you!
